41583.「ここで紹介した サポート仲間の契約時間は\n １２時間 ２４時間 ４８時間\n:

contract expires, your support buddy will be forced to leave your group. When your contract is running low, you'll get a
confirmation message. You can also check your strength to see how much time you have left. Don't forget, even if you're out adventuring
